attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lyneham is due to close in 2012 when the c130 Hercules fleet is moved to R.A.F Brize Norton We dont know why as we hav more going for it as we have 2 runways where brize has only one we have more royal families living with in 20 miles of the camp and is not sbject to going black ( closinig  due to fog)
during the snow we got in feb 2007 lyneham was the only airfield to stay open when even heathrow/gatwick/luton and brize were closed
